# 3.0.0 - 2016-07-06

* Update ESLint to 3.0.
* Update eslint-plugin-react.
* Add new rules: 1f80c3c.

# 2.0.1 - 2016-05-11

* Fix `react/display-name` rule.

# 2.0.0 - 2016-05-11

* Update ESLint to 2.x (required version in 2.9 now).
* Add new rules.

# 1.2.0 - 2016-03-15

* Add babel-eslint parser.

# 1.1.0 - 2016-03-07

* Disable `no-use-before-define` rule.

# 1.0.0 - 2016-01-13

First release.
